expage-201611 - global glacial 10Be and 26Al exposure age data

Reference:
Storey BC, Fink D, Hood D, Joy K, Shulmeister J, Riger-Kusk M, Stevens MI, 2010. Cosmogenic nuclide exposure age constraints on the glacial history of the Lake Wellman area, Darwin Mountains, Antarctica. Antarctic Science 22, 603-618.

Data comments:
Sampling year assumed to be 2008.
